size_estimation.reasoning: Estimated from shoulder width and body measurements

ai_insights.product_description: This t-shirt is a versatile and stylish piece in a sleek black color, perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. The size estimation suggests it falls within the range of L to XL, ensuring a comfortable and flattering fit. Paired with the included jeans, this ensemble exudes a casual yet put-together vibe.
ai_insights.outfit_suggestion: For a laid-back daytime look, pair this t-shirt and jeans combo with a trendy pair of white sneakers and a denim jacket thrown over the shoulders. Accessorize with some minimalist jewelry and a stylish backpack to complete the ensemble. This outfit is perfect for running errands or grabbing coffee with friends.
ai_insights.social_caption: Elevate your casual style with this classic black t-shirt and jeans combo. Effortlessly chic and comfortable for any day out. #CasualChic #FashionForward #EffortlessStyle
ai_insights.full_response:
1. PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION:
This t-shirt is a versatile and stylish piece in a sleek black color, perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. The size estimation suggests it falls within the range of L to XL, ensuring a comfortable and flattering fit. Paired with the included jeans, this ensemble exudes a casual yet put-together vibe.

2. OUTFIT_SUGGESTION:
For a laid-back daytime look, pair this t-shirt and jeans combo with a trendy pair of white sneakers and a denim jacket thrown over the shoulders. Accessorize with some minimalist jewelry and a stylish backpack to complete the ensemble. This outfit is perfect for running errands or grabbing coffee with friends.

3. SOCIAL_CAPTION:
Elevate your casual style with this classic black t-shirt and jeans combo. Effortlessly chic and comfortable for any day out. #CasualChic #FashionForward #EffortlessStyle
